body.name: NutriChef Cordless Electric Knife | Easy to Use Constant ON/OFF Safety Function Button | Carve Turkey, Meats, Poultry, Bread, Cheese & More | Lightweight with Contoured Grip Handle (White & Grey)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: VERSATILE KITCHEN TOOL - Carve meats, slice bread, and more with precision using the electric knife, which serves as an electric fillet knife, electric carving knife, and electric bread knife. Its stainless steel blades ensure quick and even slicing.

COMFORTABLE CARVING EXPERIENCE - The contoured grip handle provides a comfortable hold for extended use. Designed with safety locks, this multi-purpose electric knife ensures secure operation. The constant ON/OFF button lets you focus on carving without worrying about safety.

PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION - Crafted with quality materials, this versatile electric knife features stainless steel blades for efficient slicing. The handle is made of durable ABS, ensuring longevity. The lightweight design reduces fatigue during use.

ALL-INCLUSIVE PACKAGE - The package includes the essential components: electric knife handle, stainless steel knife, USB cable, and UL charger. The Type-C USB cable provides fast and reliable charging. Charge time is 3 hours.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS - Experience precision with this electric knife. Made with ABS and stainless steel, it's compatible with bread and meat. The USB cable allows flexibility and offers 5V/1A input for efficient charging.
body.description: Introducing the Electric Bread Knife, a versatile kitchen tool designed for effortless carving of cooked meats, poultry, bread, and even crafting foam. Its lightweight design coupled with a comfortable contoured grip handle ensures easy maneuverability. Engineered with safety locks and a constant ON/OFF pressing function button, this knife guarantees secure and controlled operation. The stainless steel blades enable quick and even slicing, while the package includes a handle, knife, USB cable, and UL charger. Constructed with ABS and stainless steel materials, it offers durability and modern aesthetics. With dimensions of 17.79" x 1.49" x 2.04" (with handle) and 11.42’’ x 1.34’’ x 0.59’’ (without handle), this Electric Bread Knife is a must-have for precision cutting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us NutriChef was created on the principle that healthy home cooking should be attainable to all, regardless of skill level and economic status. Starting in 2014, we noticed the disconnect in our lives and in the lives of those around us. We were so busy, always rushing forward, and our health and personal lives suffered. We needed to find some way to slow down and put our health first, all without sacrificing convenience or taste. Could we somehow create healthier versions of our favorite foods, easily in our own kitchens? The answer was a resounding yes, and NutriChef was born.

Our brand was created out of a desire to provide an alternative to fast food convenience and reintroduce people to home cooking. A healthy home-cooked meal is what brings families and friends together. We believe strongly in the value of simple pleasures. An evening spent cooking and sharing a meal of wholesome, nourishing foods is a memory in the making. Today, we have built upon our original mission and now in addition offer products that make the art of entertaining a simpler one. Entertaining and hosting family and friends are one of the great joys of life. Why waste a moment stuck in the kitchen? We offer products that free you up to socialize, while never sacrificing quality or taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So convenient to use
reviews.reviewText: I have an old, corded, electric knife that, while I loved, was a bit of a production to use. This knife being cordless, makes it so much more convenient for me to use regularly. I like not having to deal with maneuvering a cord around while I’m working. Best of all though, I don’t have to be near an outlet to use it. I can use this by the grill for slicing brisket, for slicing bread at the table, etc. It is a great knife and very sharp. I had actually never tried using an electric knife for slicing bread before and it is so great! It does all the slicing work for me so I don’t end up smooshing the loaf. I highly recommend trying it. Anyhow. This is a great knife. Really convenient to use. The battery lasts a long time and the blades pop in and out easily for cleaning and storage. The knife comes with a compact storage case to keep everything in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't cut home made bread.
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed with the performance. It just didn't cut well. This is my first electric knife and I went with a cordless model. Perhaps the motor just couldn't drive the blades fast enough.Cut a few loafs, required too much pressure. On a loaf with a thick crust, it simply failed. Needed to use the normal serrated bread knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slices meat perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I like that this knife is cordless. It makes it so convenient for use in the kitchen. It is simple to operate and cuts slicing time in half. The knife itself is sharp however the electric vibration helps it to cut faster. I am able to cut thin and thick slices from larger cuts of meat like ham and turkey. It’s a must for the holiday meals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality electric knife
reviews.reviewText: Poor quality knife. Bare sliced thru a prime rib
